column4: pls-daemon, i'm sadly a linux newbie and thought ubuntu was user-friendly
it is. what's up

it doesnt.. im using a brand new install of ubuntu 6.06 lts
what terminal are you using? gnome console ?
my x server is now working. this the problem im trying to fix
not working
oh are you using irssi now ?
bitchx
you cannot use your mouse default in that mode
probably you don't need it.
what error do you get in your x
is this fiesty fawn ?
I had the same error with fiesty fawn, but I couldn't fixed it (I havent spent time for it)
other than that, try #linux, #kernel, and "wishie" from #alsa (he is sleeping now)
do you have any data with your installation ?
im sure theres data somewhere? the os takes up several gbs's
I mean do you have any personal data that you do not want to lose ?
can you afford formatting your drive?
i'd rather not.. i just did to install the OS
insalling OS is no biggie, if you can afford, I strongly recommend using 6.10 instead of 6.06
